original: intros u M. split. - intro H. apply Sup_seq_correct in H. destruct H as [H _]. unfold is_sup_seq in H. specialize (H Rlt). apply H with (eps := Rlt_0_1) in H0. destruct H0 as [n Hn]. exists n. apply Hn. - intros [n Hn]. apply Sup_seq_correct. unfold is_sup_seq. intros eps. split. + intros. apply Hn. simpl. apply Rbar_lt_not_le, Rbar_plus_lt_compat_r. rewrite <- Rbar_plus_0_l. apply Rbar_lt_plus_compat; auto. + exists n. simpl. apply Rbar_lt_not_le, Rbar_plus_lt_compat_l. rewrite <- Rbar_plus_0_r. apply Rbar_lt_plus_compat; auto.
